foreignData.flavorText: Obwohl sie in Jaspera-Bäumen gefangen sind, flüstern die Einir genannten elfischen Götter im Wandel der Zeiten noch immer.
foreignData.name: Wurzeln der Weisheit
foreignData.text: Du millst drei Karten. Bringe dann eine Länderkarte oder eine Elf-Karte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Falls du dies nicht kannst, ziehe eine Karte. (Um eine Karte zu millen, lege die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.)

foreignData.flavorText: Aunque están encerrados en árboles jaspera, los dioses élficos, conocidos como los einir, siguen susurrando a través de los tiempos.
foreignData.name: Raíces de la sabiduría
foreignData.text: Muele tres cartas, luego regresa una carta de tierra o de Elfo de tu cementerio a tu mano. Si no puedes, roba una carta. (Para moler una carta, pon la primera carta de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.)

foreignData.flavorText: Bien que prisonniers des arbres Jaspera, les dieux elfes qu'on appelait les Einir continuent de murmurer à travers les âges.

foreignData.name: Radici della Saggezza

foreignData.flavorText: ヤスペラの樹に幽閉されながらも、アイニールと呼ばれるエルフの神々は長い年月を超えてささやき続けている。
foreignData.name: 知識の根
foreignData.text: カード３枚を切削する。その後、あなたの墓地にあり土地やエルフであるカード１枚をあなたの手札に戻す。そうできないなら、カード１枚を引く。（カードを切削するとは、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカードをあなたの墓地に置くことである。）

foreignData.flavorText: 虽然称作埃尼尔神族的妖精古神被禁锢在雅斯佩树中，但他们的低语依旧能穿越时代。

mainBoard.name: Roots of Wisdom
mainBoard.originalText: Mill three cards, then return a land card or Elf card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: If there’s a land card or Elf card in your graveyard, you must return one. You can’t choose not to in order to draw a card.
Roots of Wisdom doesn’t target any cards in graveyards. You may return a land card or an Elf card that was just milled or one that was already there.

mainBoard.text: Mill three cards, then return a land card or Elf card from your graveyard to your hand. If you can't, draw a card. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

mainBoard.name: Instruments of War
mainBoard.originalText:
Flash
As Instruments of War enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

rulings.text: The choice of creature type is made as Instruments of War enters the battlefield. Players can't take any actions between the time the choice is made and the time the appropriate creatures begin to get +1/+1.
You must choose an existing creature type, such as Human or Warrior. Card types such as artifact and supertypes such as legendary can't be chosen.

foreignData.name: Elfenbogen

Die ausgerüstete Kreatur erhält +1/+2 und hat Reichweite.

La criatura equipada obtiene +1/+2 y tiene la habilidad de alcance.

La créature équipée gagne +1/+2 et a la portée.

La creatura equipaggiata prende +1/+2 e ha raggiungere.

mainBoard.name: Elven Bow
mainBoard.originalText:
When Elven Bow enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token, then attach Elven Bow to it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has reach.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: The Elf Warrior creature token enters the battlefield as a 1/1 creature. Any abilities that trigger when a creature with a certain power or toughness enters the battlefield will see the token enter as a 1/1 creature.

You decide whether to pay {2} as the enters-the-battlefield ability resolves. If you do, you immediately create the Elf Warrior creature token and attach Elven Bow to it. No players may respond to your decision to pay or not, and no player may take actions during this process.
